body_html:
@yujulucy I tried before, and I found that if I run standalone training(not distribute training), the code you wrote:
gpu_options = tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.3)
sess = tf.Session(config=tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=gpu_options, log_device_placement=False))
works, but if run distribute training, and it didn't work. i also want to know how to solve it.
focus on it.

body:
@yujulucy  I  tried before, and I found that if I run standalone training(not distribute training), the code you wrote: 
gpu_options = tf.GPUOptions(per_process_gpu_memory_fraction=0.3)
sess = tf.Session(config=tf.ConfigProto(gpu_options=gpu_options, log_device_placement=False))
 works, but if run distribute training, and it didn't work. i also want to know how to solve it.
focus on it.
